product_description: New! California almonds. It all starts with the California sun. We then grind these almonds in small batches to deliver a distinct flavor and unforgettable taste. Try a tablespoon or two in your favorite smoothie for a dose of protein and a creamier texture. No stir!

name: Spread The Love UNSALTED Almond Butter, 16 Ounce (All Natural, Vegan, Gluten-free, Creamy, No added salt, No added sugar, No palm fruit oil, Not pasteurized with PPO)
short_description: Proudly Made in California: Crafted in small batches using premium roasted California almonds in a peanut-free facility, ensuring top quality and exceptional flavor.
Clean Ingredients for Every Lifestyle: Vegan, gluten-free, and made without preservatives, it's a wholesome choice for anyone embracing clean eating or managing dietary restrictions.
No Refrigeration Needed: Store conveniently at room temperature. Oil separation is natural—just stir to enjoy smooth, creamy almond butter. Packaged in BPA-free, 16 oz jars for safety and freshness.
Versatile for Snacking and Cooking: Spread on toast, drizzle over fruit, blend into smoothies, or enjoy by the spoonful. Adds rich, nutty flavor to baking, from cookies to cakes.
Nutrient-Packed and Wholesome: A great source of protein, fiber, healthy fats, and essential nutrients like Vitamin E, magnesium, and antioxidants to support a healthy lifestyle.
Natural Energy for Active Lifestyles: A go-to for athletes and fitness enthusiasts, providing long-lasting energy and aiding muscle recovery without added sugars or palm oil.
Family-Friendly and Diet-Friendly: Suits a variety of diets, including vegan, paleo, and keto. Its smooth texture and natural taste make it a hit with kids and adults alike.
Supports Balanced Health Goals: With no added sugars or preservatives, our almond butter helps maintain stable blood sugar levels and supports weight management goals.
Small Batch, Big Flavor: Experience the difference of almond butter made with care, from premium ingredients to a smooth, spreadable texture that’s irresistibly delicious.
From Our Family to Yours: As a small, family-owned business, we take pride in crafting almond butter with care and dedication, bringing you a product made with love and attention to detail.

product_description: Who are we? Well, we seek out the finest natural and organic foods available, maintain the strictest quality standards in the industry, and have an unshakeable commitment to sustainable agriculture. We ban 300+ ingredients from all food that we sell, including hydrogenated fats, high-fructose corn syrup and sweeteners such as aspartame, sucralose and saccharin, so you can skip deciphering ingredient labels and cut to relishing your finds. Our 365 by Whole Foods Market brand offers over 2,500 affordably priced and thoughtfully sourced products that not only meet our already strict standards, but also in many cases go above and beyond what we require of other brands.

name: Kevala Almond Butter Creamy - Premium Natural Sandwich Spread with No Dairy in a Glass Jar, Made from Carefully Selected Almonds, Delicious Peanut Butter Substitute with no Sugar Added, 12 oz
short_description: Exceptional Quality: This smooth almond spread in non-GMO Project verified, Vegan, and made with a first-rate selection of dry roasted almonds. Processed in a facility free of peanuts and gluten, providing a safe option for many diets.

Nutrient-Packed: A natural source of essential minerals - potassium, iron, and calcium - our almond butter is also rich in dietary fiber. It delivers a wholesome blend of nutrients for everyday nourishment and deliciously balanced flavor.

Convenient Glass Packaging: Comes in a sturdy, reusable glass jar that fits perfectly in any kitchen pantry. Store at room temperature to keep the almond butter’s smooth, creamy texture and rich flavor.

Perfect Addition to Baking and Cooking: The sweetness and rich texture of our creamy almond butter enriches desserts such as brownies and cookies, and makes for a great base for salad dressings and sauces with an interesting nutty twist.

Snack Power-Up: Kevala Almond Butter is not only great for your favorite sweet and savory recipes but also makes quick and simple snacks tastier with no effort. Spread it on apple slices, rice cakes, or crackers for delicious bites on the go.
product_description: Our Premium Natural Almond Butter is made with the best California grown almonds, these are dry roasted and milled to produce a pure, great tasting, nutritious and healthy spread. Ingredients: Dry Roasted Almonds. Try Kevala's Almond Butter as a spread over toast, stir over hot oatmeal or fresh fruit, add its nutty flavor in baking, to smoothies for a protein punch, and more! Made in a Peanut-Free Facility.

name: Octonuts Dry Roasted Pure Almond Nut Butter 16oz - Pure Creamy Nut Butter - Gluten Free, Vegan, Kosher, Paleo, Non-GMO Nut Butters Single Ingredient
short_description: Rich, Creamy and Absolutely Delicious - Looking for a decadent treat? Almond butter provides a satisfying nutrient dense snack that will energize your body. Our nut butter is perfect for breakfast, afternoon, or a post workout snack.
Packed with Plant Based Protein, Healthy Fats and Minerals. This creamy almond butter is paleo certified. Snacking on pure quality nut butter can help keep your body strong, healthy and balanced.

Dry Roasted to perfection and made with simple ingredients that maximize the nut-tritious plant-based goodness without added oils and saturated fats. Our products are made in facilities free of peanuts, soy, and dairy.

Grown with Love in the California Sun - Our all natural nut butters are Non GMO verified, Paleo, Kosher, and Paleo Vegan certified. Blended to a rich and creamy perfection, this keto nut butter is healthy and delicious.

A classic, only butter. Our Roasted Creamy Almond Butter is the gold standard when it comes to delicious, nut-ritious snacks. And it’s no wonder: our premium almonds are grown, roasted and blended to nut-buttery perfection on a family farm in sunny California. Packed with nutty flavor and rich with plant-based protein and vitamin A, every bite is meant to savor—and satisfy on every level.
